programme.desc: הקומדיה הרומנטית הגדולה של ויליאם שייקספיר, בבימויו של קנת' בראנה. דוכסית צעירה שגורשה מביתה יוצאת אל העולם לבושה כגבר. ביער קסום היא מחזרת בלהט אחר אהוב ליבה. עם: טאקויה שימאדה, בריאן בלסד, ריצ'ארד קליפורד. 2006.(n)

programme.title: האמא של המסיבות
programme.desc: קומדיה. לאחר שבעלה מתגרש ממנה במפתיע, מחליטה אם בגיל העמידה לבצע שינוי מרענן בחייה. לשם כך היא נרשמת לקולג' של בתה במטרה לסיים את התואר שמעולם לא היה לה. עם: מליסה מקארתי ("מרגלת"), גיליאן ג'ייקובס. במאי:בן פאלקון. 2018.(n)

programme.title: כדורגל בסגנון שאולין
programme.desc: קומדיה. כדורגלן לשעבר המבקש להקים קבוצה מנצחת, עולה על הרעיון של שילוב כדורגל עם קונג פו, ומקים קבוצה שחבריה אמונים על אמנות הלחימה. עם: סטיבן צ'או, ויקי זאו נג מן טאט. במאי:סטבן צ'או. הונג קונג 2002.(n)

programme.title: מה שבחורה רוצה
programme.desc: קומדיה. נערה שגדלה בניו יורק עם אמה הבוהמיינית, יוצאת לאנגליה כדי לפגוש לראשונה את אביה, הלורד הבריטי, ונתקלת בעוינות מצד ארוסתו ובתה. עם: אמנדה ביינס, קולין פירת. במאי: דני גורדון. ארה"ב, 2003.(n)

programme.title: נני מקפי 2: הקסם חוזר
programme.desc: קומדיה. הנני מגיעה לעזור לגברת גרין, לשלוט בילדיה הפרועים. כשמלחמת תרבות פורצת בין עכברי הכפר לעכברי העיר, שולפת נני מקפי את תוכנית חמשת השיעורים שלה. עם: אמה תומפסון, רייף פינס. במאית: סוזאנה ווייט. 2010.(n)

programme.title: מונק: החקירה האחרונה
programme.desc: קומדיה. טוני שלהוב חוזר לגלם את הבלש אדריאן מונק מהסדרה המצליחה "מונק". הבלש המבריק בעל הפרעה טורדנית-כפייתית, חוזר לפתור מקרה אחרון ואישי במיוחד בו מעורבת בתו החורגת, עיתונאית שמתכוננת לחתונתה. במאי: רנדי זיסק. 2023.(n)

programme.title: החתונה היוונית שלי 3
programme.desc: קומדיה רומנטית, החלק ה-3 בסדרה שהפכה לקלאסיקה. כשנה לאחר אירועי הסרט הקודם ומותו של אב המשפחה, יוצאת משפחת פורטוקאלוס למסע שורשים מרגש ביוון, בחיפוש אחר חברי ילדות של אביהם לאיחוד משפחתי. עם: ניה ורדלוס (שגם ביימה). 2023.(n)

programme.title: מה גברים רוצים
programme.desc: קומדיה רומנטית קורעת. סוכנת ספורט מצליחה מרגישה שעמיתיה הגברים לא סופרים אותה. חייה משתנים לאחר שהיא לוגמת משקה הגורם לה לשמוע על מה גברים חושבים... עם: טראג'י פ. הנסון ('אימפריה'), טרייסי מורגן. במאי: אדם שנקמן. 2019.(n)

programme.title: אמריקן אולטרא
programme.desc: קומדיית אקשן. צעיר סטלן שגר בעיירה קטנה מגלה שהוא למעשה נכס ממשלתי שתוכנן לשמש כמכונת הריגה, אולם כעת הוא נחשב לנטל ומיועד לחיסול. עם: ג'סי אייזנברג, קריסטן סטיוארט. במאי: נימה נוריזדה. ארה"ב, 2015.(n)

programme.title: מומיות (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות היסטורית והיסטרית! שלוש מומיות מצריות חיות בעיר סודית תת-קרקעית במצרים העתיקה. לאחר שטבעת המלוכה הקסומה נגנבת, למומיות אין ברירה אלא לצאת למסע חיפוש מטורף, חוצה יבשות וזמן. דיבוב עב': אורי זלצמן. 2023.(n)

programme.title: תזיזו ת'רגליים 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. הפינגווינים חוזרים לעוד הרפתקה קצבית, והפעם, פינגווין קטן שמפחד לרקוד, פוגש פינגווין מעופף, כאשר איום חדש מסכן את עולם הפינגווינים כולו... דיבוב עברית. במאי: ג'ורג' מילר. 2011. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: טבאלוגה - הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה קסומה אודות טבאלוגה, הדרקון הצעיר, שיוצא למסע התבגרות, אך נופל בשבי שליט אכזר המתכנן להקפיא את העולם. חברתו החדשה, נסיכת הקרח, מסייעת לו להימלט והשניים יוצאים להרפתקה.. בימוי: סוון אונטרוולדט. 2019. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: סרט לגו 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. 5 שנים לאחר אירועי הסרט הקודם, השלווה שוב מופרת לאחר שפולשים מדופלו מהחלל החיצון משתלטים על העיר. כעת יוצאים אמט, לוסי, באטמן ושאר החברים להגן על מולדתם. דיבוב: יפתח אופיר. בימוי: מייק מיטשל. 2019. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מעופפת (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. התלמידה הכי מעופפת בבית הספר לפיות שיניים, מוצאת את עצמה תקועה בעולם "האמיתי" אחרי משימה מבולבלת במיוחד. כעת, בעזרת ילדה בשם מקסי, היא תצטרך למצוא את הדרך בחזרה הביתה, לעולם הקסמים. דיבוב עב': שחר קדוש. 2022.(n)

programme.title: סופר ראביט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. מקס, הארנב העירוני השובב, נשלח לבית ספר מיוחד שבו התלמידים שומרים על ביצת זהב קסומה. כשהוא מנסה לשוב אל העיר, הוא נתקל בסכנות ולומד על חברות אמיתית. דיבוב: יהונתן מגון. במאית: אוטה פון מונצ'ו-פול. 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הדב פדינגטון (מדובב)
programme.desc: סרט ילדים קסום, משעשע ונוגע ללב שכבש את העולם. עלילותיו של פדינגטון: דב מתוק, נבון ודי שובב, המגיע ללונדון מיערות פרו הרחוקים ופוגש משפחה המעניקה לו בית חם. עם: ניקול קידמן. במאי: פול קינג. בריטניה, 2014. כ' עב'.\r\n.(n)

programme.title: סוניק - הסרט
programme.desc: קומדיית אקשן לכל המשפחה בכיכובו של ג'ים קארי. סוניק, הקיפוד הכחול והמהיר, מגיע לכדור הארץ וחובר לשריף חביב במטרה להתחמק ממדען מרושע המבקש לעשות מסוניק קיפוד ניסיונות. עם: ג'יימס מרסדן. במאי: ג'ף פאולר. 2020.(n)

programme.title: הדרקון הראשון שלי 2
programme.desc: אנימציה. הויקינג היקאפ והדרקון הנאמן שלו ממשיכים בהרפתקאותיהם המופלאות, והם חייבים להגן על השלום ולשמור על עתידם של בני האדם והדרקונים מרשע בשם דראגו. קולות: ג'יי ברושל, קייט בלנשט, ג'ררד באטלר. במאי: דין דבלויס. 2014.(n)

programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.(n)

programme.title: מפרץ ההרפתקאות: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. ריידר וכלבי יחידת החילוץ נקראים לעיר ההרפתקאות על מנת לנסות ולהציל אותה מראש העיר המדינגר, המשחק בצורה מסוכנת עם מזג האוויר בעיר וגרם להרס וחורבן. דיבוב עב': שיר כהן. במאי: קאל ברונקר. 2021. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מעופפת (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. התלמידה הכי מעופפת בבית הספר לפיות שיניים, מוצאת את עצמה תקועה בעולם "האמיתי" אחרי משימה מבולבלת במיוחד. כעת, בעזרת ילדה בשם מקסי, היא תצטרך למצוא את הדרך בחזרה הביתה, לעולם הקסמים. דיבוב עב': שחר קדוש. 2022.

programme.title: מטוסי על: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. הדמויות האהובות מהסדרה הפופולרית בהרפתקה סוחפת. ג'ט, מטוס הסילון המהיר בעולם נקלע למזימה של בילי ווילי, הנבל העירוני שמתכנן לגרום לשיבושים בעיר. יחד עם מטוסי העל הנאמנים הם יוצאים להציל את העיר. מדובב לעב'. 2024.

programme.title: משפחה בהחלפה 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה, משפחת ווישבון הייחודית נאלצת שוב להחליף זהות , והפעם כדי להציל את דרקולה וחבריו המפלצות אשר נחטפו במפתיע. דיבוב עב': אריאל לינדזן. במאי: הולגר טאפה. 2021.

programme.title: קפטן תחתונים: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית אנימציה עפ"י סדרת הספרים המצליחה. ג'ורג' והרולד השובבים הצליחו לשלב בין אהבתם לקומיקס ותעלולים, והפכו את מנהל ביה"ס הקשוח לקפטן תחתונים, גיבור העל הקצת מגוחך. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי. במאי: דיוויד סורן. 2017. כ' עב'.

programme.title: נני מקפי 2: הקסם חוזר (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה. הנני מגיעה לעזור לגברת גרין, לשלוט בילדיה הפרועים. כשמלחמת תרבות פורצת בין עכברי הכפר לעכברי העיר, שולפת נני מקפי את תוכנית חמשת השיעורים שלה. עם: אמה תומפסון. במאית: סוזאנה ווייט. 2010. כ' עב'.

programme.desc: סרט ילדים קסום, משעשע ונוגע ללב שכבש את העולם. עלילותיו של פדינגטון: דב מתוק, נבון ודי שובב, המגיע ללונדון מיערות פרו הרחוקים ופוגש משפחה המעניקה לו בית חם. עם: יו בונוויל, ניקול קידמן. במאי: פול קינג. בריטניה, 2014.

programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה, משפחת ווישבון הייחודית נאלצת שוב להחליף זהות , והפעם כדי להציל את דרקולה וחבריו המפלצות אשר נחטפו במפתיע. דיבוב עב': אריאל לינדזן. במאי: הולגר טאפה. 2021.

programme.title: בנות הפאוואר פאף: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה המבוססת על סדרת הטלוויזיה הפופולרית. שלושת בנות הפאוור פאף בעלות כוחות העל, נאבקות באויבן המושבע המנסה להשתלט על עירן. דיבוב: מאיה בר שלום, אורלי קטן, שרי. במאי: קרייג מק'קרקן. ארה"ב, 2002. כ' עב'.

programme.title: משימה חתולית בהחלט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. חתולה משועממת, המעבירה את רוב זמנה מול הטלויזיה, מחליטה להכניס קצת אקשן לחייה ויוצאת לחפש אחר כנופיית פורצים בשכונה. לרוע מזלה, היא וחבריה נחשדים ע"י המשטרה כי הם עצמם הפורצים. גרמניה, 2018. כ' עב'.

programme.title: תזיזו ת'רגליים 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. הפינגווינים חוזרים לעוד הרפתקה קצבית, והפעם, פינגווין קטן שמפחד לרקוד, פוגש פינגווין מעופף, כאשר איום חדש מסכן את עולם הפינגווינים כולו... דיבוב עברית. במאי: ג'ורג' מילר. 2011. כ' עב'.

programme.title: לעוף עם ערפד (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. ערפד בן 13 מגיע לכדוה"א לאחר שנמלט מצייד ערפדים. במנוסתו הוא פוגש נער אנושי בן גילו והשניים, שהופכים לחברים, מחליטים להילחם ביחד בצייד. דיבוב: שירלי לילו. בימוי: ריצ'רד קלאוס, קרסטן קילריך. 2017. כ' עב'.

programme.title: משפחה במסכה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות סוחפת. אנה מקבלת את חליפת הסופר-על שלה בדיוק כמו כל משפחתה. יש רק בעיה אחת - אין בה שום תכונה שמתאימה לגיבור-על וכעת בטחון העיר תלוי בה. דיבוב: יובל ינאי, אסתי קוסוביצקי. במאי: ראסמוס סיברסטן, 2022.

programme.title: משפחה בהחלפה 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה, משפחת ווישבון הייחודית נאלצת שוב להחליף זהות , והפעם כדי להציל את דרקולה וחבריו המפלצות אשר נחטפו במפתיע. דיבוב עב': אריאל לינדזן. במאי: הולגר טאפה. 2021.

programme.title: עלילות ספיידרוויק (מדובב)
programme.desc: פנטזיה. הלן גרייס עוברת לגור באחוזת ספיידרוויק הקסומה עם שלושת ילדיה. לא עובר הרבה זמן והמשפחה מוצאת את עצמה נמשכת לעולם של יצורים משונים ופיות. דיבוב: גל שמי, שירי גדני. במאי: מארק ווטרס. ארה"ב, 2008. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מפרץ ההרפתקאות: הסרט
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. ריידר וכלבי יחידת החילוץ נקראים לעיר ההרפתקאות על מנת לנסות ולהציל אותה מראש העיר המדינגר, המשחק בצורה מסוכנת עם מזג האוויר בעיר וגרם להרס וחורבן. דיבוב: קים קרדשיאן. במאי: קאל ברונקר. 2021.

programme.title: היידי בת ההרים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. הסיפור האהוב על הילדה המקסימה שחיה עם סבא שלה בהרי שוויץ הירוקים ועוברת לעיר הגדולה כדי לעזור לקלרה המרותקת לכסא גלגלים. עם: אנוק שטפן, ברונו גאנץ. דיבוב: איילה פלדמן. גרמניה, 2015. כ' עב'.

programme.desc: Celtic v Rangers (Kic"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"k-off 12.30pm). Coverage of the final Old Firm Derby of the Scottish Premiership season, held at Celtic Park. The hosts have dominated in this fixture in recent years, including beating their rivals on penalties in the League Cup final back in December and winning this meeting earlier on in the season 3-0. However Rangers did win the last meeting between the two sides in early January, dominating the game and winning 3-0 at Ibrox.

programme.title: Live Premier League
programme.desc: Arsenal v Chelsea (Kick-off 1.30pm). Coverage of the match between the London rivals at Emirates Stadium. The sides shared the spoils in a 1-1 draw in November's reverse fixture, but both teams will be keen to claim all three points on this occasion, as Arsenal will be looking to keep their fading hopes of winning the title alive, and the Blues are aiming to finish in the top four.

programme.title: Live EFL Cup
programme.desc: Liverpool v Newcastle United (Kick-off 4.30pm). All the action from the final at Wembley Stadium. The Reds won this competition last year, with Virgil van Dijk scoring the only goal of the game in extra time to help them overcome Chelsea in the showpiece match. They are now looking to win the cup for a record-extending 11th time after overcoming Tottenham Hotspur 4-1 on aggregate in the semi-finals. In contrast, Newcastle have never previously lifted this trophy, but they impressed in the last four, defeating Arsenal home and away, and will now look to go one better than two seasons ago when they were beaten by Manchester United in the final.

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Leicester City v Manchester United (Kick-off 7.00pm). Coverage of the Premier League match at King Power Stadium. The sides have met on three occasions already, with United winning all three of them. The most recent of those matches was the most closely contested, with United prevailing 2-1 courtesy of former Leicester player Harry Maguire's controversial late winner.

programme.title: The Players Championship Live
programme.desc: Coverage of day four of the prestigious tournament from TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida. programme.title: The Man with the Answers
programme.desc: A former diving champion and an eccentric student take an adventurous road trip of rediscovery. Romantic drama, starring Vasilis Magouliotis, Anton Weil and Stella Fyrogeni. In Greek, Italian, German and English.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: The story of Frank Abagnale Jr, who found notoriety as a teenager conning and charming his way across America. Posing as a pilot, a doctor and a lawyer, Frank was able to fund an extravagant lifestyle while outwitting the FBI at every turn. Fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen and James Brolin.(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Golden Globe-winning comic drama, written and directed by Greta Gerwig. Artistic California teenager Lady Bird expects much from life. However, the strained relationship with her mother and failing family finances keep clipping her wings, while early romance leads to heartache. Saoirse Ronan, Laurie Metcalf and Tracy Letts star.(n)

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A white rapper strives to make a name for himself on the music scene, but his deprived home life on a Detroit trailer park and romantic complications put a damper on his plans as he struggles to win over the crowds and earn the respect of his peers. Drama, starring Eminem, Kim Basinger, Mekhi Phifer and Brittany Murphy.(n)

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.(n)

programme.title: Sundown
programme.desc: Neil and Alice Bennett are the core of a wealthy family on holiday in Mexico, until a distant emergency cuts their trip short. When one relative disrupts the family's tight-knit order, simmering tensions rise to the fore. Drama, starring Tim Roth, Albertine Kotting McMillan and Samuel Bottomley.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.desc: A former diving champion and an eccentric student take an adventurous road trip of rediscovery. Romantic drama, starring Vasilis Magouliotis, Anton Weil and Stella Fyrogeni. In Greek, Italian, German and English.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Two teenage boys from different London backgrounds embark on a road trip North together. As they open up about their pasts, the lads learn they have more in common than they thought. Drama co-written by and starring Jamie Flatters, with Keenan Munn-Francis, Nicholas Pinnock and Paul Kaye.

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: Biblical drama telling the story of Jesus Christ at the age of seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth and the youngster begins to discover the true extent of his gifts. Adam Greaves-Neal stars, with Sara Lazzaro, Christian McKay and Sean Bean.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: Biblical drama telling the story of Jesus Christ at the age of seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth and the youngster begins to discover the true extent of his gifts. Adam Greaves-Neal stars, with Sara Lazzaro, Christian McKay and Sean Bean.

programme.title: Carmen & Lola
programme.desc: After two Roma women's lives collide in the suburbs of Madrid, they are forced to make a difficult choice between community and love. Award-winning LGBTQ+ drama, starring Rosy Rodríguez and Zaira Romero.

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Wallace is a medical school drop-out who has given up on love after a series of bad break-ups, while Chantry is an animator who lives with her boyfriend. The two become friends since neither is interested in a relationship with the other - but as they grow closer, they begin to wonder if they belong together. Romantic drama, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Zoe Kazan.

programme.title: Monsoon
programme.desc: A British-Vietnamese man returns to his birth country for the first time in more than 30 years. He was only eight when he and his family escaped Saigon as boat refugees during the Vietnam-American war. Now he embarks on a personal journey from Saigon to Hanoi to find a place to scatter his parents' ashes. Drama, starring Henry Golding, Parker Sawyers, David Tran and Molly Harris.

programme.title: Burlesque
programme.desc: A woman goes to work as a cocktail waitress at a burlesque club which is teetering on the brink of closure. The manager gives her the chance to perform and she has soon become the venue's star attraction, drawing the attention of a sleazy developer with plans for the site. Musical drama, starring Cher, Christina Aguilera, Cam Gigandet and Stanley Tucci.

programme.title: A Good Person
programme.desc: Allison is a young woman whose world falls apart when she survives an unimaginable tragedy. While in recovery for an opioid addiction and unresolved grief, she forms an unlikely friendship with her would-be father-in-law, Daniel, that gives her a fighting chance to put her life back together. Writer/director Zach Braff's drama, starring Florence Pugh and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who won't be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Payne's comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, Da'Vine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: The disaster-prone journalist seems to have finally found the perfect boyfriend. However, when the couple start to squabble over their personal habits, she decides to decamp for a while to Thailand and write a travelogue. Unfortunately, she has reckoned without the reappearance of a duplicitous old flame - and a spell behind bars in a Thai prison. Romantic comedy sequel, with Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant, Jim Broadbent and Gemma Jones.

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Wallace is a medical school drop-out who has given up on love after a series of bad break-ups, while Chantry is an animator who lives with her boyfriend. The two become friends since neither is interested in a relationship with the other - but as they grow closer, they begin to wonder if they belong together. Romantic drama, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Zoe Kazan.

Writer/director Zach Braff's drama, starring Florence Pugh and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Jesus Revolution
programme.desc: During the 1970s, a commune of teenage hippies in Southern California paves the way for a national spiritual awakening. Drama based on a true story, starring Joel Courtney, Jonathan Roumie and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: L'immensità
programme.desc: In 1970s Rome, a mother contends with her loveless and abusive marriage while caring for her children, one of who is experiencing gender dysphoria and wishes to identify as a boy. Family drama, starring Penélope Cruz, Vincenzo Amato and Luana Giuliani. In Italian.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who won't be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Payne's comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, Da'Vine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason

Romantic comedy sequel, with Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant, Jim Broadbent and Gemma Jones.

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. Starring Phoebe Dynevor, Matthew Goode and David Morrissey.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Two female jailbirds imprisoned for murder pull out all the stops to seize the attention of the media. Aided by a slick lawyer, both women are desperate to find fame and fortune and escape the death penalty by winning public sympathy. Musical, starring Renee Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, John C Reilly and Queen Latifah.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander.

programme.desc: During the 1970s, a commune of teenage hippies in Southern California paves the way for a national spiritual awakening. Drama based on a true story, starring Joel Courtney, Jonathan Roumie and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani.(n)

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A youngster must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skateboarder. Confronted with the uncertainty of his future - and how it might impact his friends and family - he takes steps to build relationships with professional skaters in an effort to forge his own path. Comedy drama, starring Ryder McLaughlin, Vince Vaughn and Miranda Cosgrove.(n)

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser discovers a new sense of purpose when she meets a widower working to provide for his daughters. Drama, starring Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson and Nancy Travis.(n)

programme.title: Soft & Quiet
programme.desc: An elementary school teacher organises a mixer of like-minded women, when she encounters a woman from her past, leading to an explosive chain of events. Thriller, starring Stefanie Estes and Olivia Luccardi.(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five teenagers who occupy different areas of their school's social structure are thrown together for a Saturday morning detention. During the day, they analyse their behaviour and find unexpected common ground. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason.(n)

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee.(n)

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: At a girls' middle school plagued by bullying, a student's tragic death leads to a wave of disappearances. Thriller, starring Eric Wang and Ning Chang. In Mandarin with English subtitles.(n)

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.(n)

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. The third instalment of director Ti West's acclaimed X film series, starring Mia Goth, Lily Collins, Giancarlo Esposito and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. Writer/director Chris Weitz's sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine.

programme.title: Fight or Flight

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. Director Austin Peters' thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks and Lewis Pullman.

programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.(n)

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: After 93-year-old Thelma is conned by a phone scammer, she embarks on a risky journey across LA with only one thing on her mind - revenge. Comedy, starring June Squibb, Fred Hechinger, Parker Posey, Clark Gregg and in one of his final films, Richard Roundtree.(n)

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani.(n)

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov.(n)

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. Writer/director Chris Weitz's sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. Director Austin Peters' thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks and Lewis Pullman.(n)

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of Tinseltown, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past. The third instalment of director Ti West's acclaimed X film series, starring Mia Goth, Lily Collins, Giancarlo Esposito and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.desc: The story behind two NASA astronauts who planned to spend ten days in space but ended up staying more than nine months; how the test mission evolved, how they've handled the unexpected and why NASA insists no one is stuck in space.(n)

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror prequel starring Lupita Nyong'o and Joseph Quinn. New York City is suddenly attacked by terrifying alien creatures with super-sensitive hearing. Sam, a terminally ill cancer patient, and law student Eric are among those who have survived the initial assault - but how long can they remain alive when the faintest noise can be deadly?

programme.title: Asteroid City
programme.desc: Wes Anderson's sci-fi comedy drama starring Jason Schwartzman, Scarlett Johansson and Tom Hanks. In the 1950s, a TV documentary goes behind the scenes on the development of a new play, which depicts a series of characters arriving at a small desert town only to be barred from leaving after a UFO makes contact.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Kelly Macdonald and Damian Lewis. Although they blend in with suburban middle-class society, Helen and Peter Radley are secretly abstinent vampires. But when their children suddenly become aware of this "family disease", the parents are forced to seek support from Peter's free-spirited twin, Will, who begins to rouse the family's feral urges.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Hilary Swank and Alan Ritchson. A struggling hairdresser in small-town Kentucky finds purpose by putting her energies into helping a widowed father get the funds to provide a liver transplant for his youngest daughter.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Road movie starring Jamie Flatters and Keenan Munn-Francis. Outgoing London teen Nathan stumbles across his shy school friend Sam being mugged and leaps in to save him. Discovering that they are both planning to travel north, Sam offers Nathan a seat in his car.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: Out to kill a man he has never met, Wilson, a seasoned assassin completing his final assignment in Fuerteventura, is drawn to a ghostly shipwreck. Thriller, starring Ian McShane, Nora Arnezeder and Fanny Ardant.

programme.desc: A high-school senior (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) and her friends must deal with repercussions of cheating death when they survive a terrible roller-coaster accident.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: A horrifying premonition saves a young man (Bobby Campo) and his friends from death during a racetrack accident, but terrible fates await them nonetheless.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: When a man's premonition saves them from a fatal bridge collapse, several unfortunate souls learn that Death will not be cheated.

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme

programme.title: The Accountant

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: A chosen hobbit (Elijah Wood) and his loyal friends join a wizard (Ian McKellen), humans, a dwarf and an elf on a quest to destroy a powerful ring and defeat an evil lord.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Now divided, members of a fellowship take different paths to destroy the ring and defeat evil Sauron and his pawns.

programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: When a vengeful trio of ancient gods arrives on Earth in search of the magic stolen from them long ago, Shazam and his allies get thrust into a battle for their superpowers, their lives, and the fate of the world.
